item.title: Without Escape on consoles!
item.description: It’s been a while since my last post… sorry about that! But I wanted to let you know that Without Escape is available in a wide variety of consoles. If you haven’t played it, you can get it for your favorite console!

item.title: Without Escape announcement
item.description: Hi, everyone! I just wanted to announce the game I’m working on. It’s called Without Escape and it is a point and click horror graphic adventure. It is inspired by those first person graphic adventures with pre-rendered backgrounds from the 90s.
